type.description: The activity '$name' is a group of listners waiting for one, or more events to trigger some actions. $name has following listners: $dependents
The activity '$name' is a sequence of activities/actions to be performed. Following activities will be executed in the sequence to mark the completion of $name: $dependents
In this activity, a condition is evaluated and if its true, one or more activities are executed
The activity '$name' runs through group of rules to check accordance with a policy
The activity '$name' waits for an event to occur. On occurence of the event, it may execute one or more activities like $dependents
This activity '$name' defines a new state in the workflow
This activity '$name' is first executed when a state is initialized
This activity '$name' defines a logical seperation of activities based on one ore more conditions. If none of the conditions is met, it is likely that no action will be executed.
This activity '$name' may contain one or more activities to be performed. This is dependent on a condition defined in its parent activity
This activity '$name' sets the next state to $TargetStateName
